articles.title: 'Transformers' Producer on Michael Bay's Involvement on 'Rise of the Beasts' - Collider
articles.description: 'Transformers: Rise of the Beasts' Producer Lorenzo Di Bonaventura tells Collider the extent of Michael Bay's involvement in the new movie.
articles.content: Ever since the Transformers franchise made its debut in 2007, it has been practically impossible to dissociate it from director Michael Bay. After helming five installments in the film series, he act… [+3066 chars]

articles.author: Elyse Dupre
articles.title: Would Kendra Wilkinson Ever Get Back Together With Ex Hank Baskett? She Says... - E! NEWS
articles.description: Years after Kendra Wilkinson and Hank Baskett finalized their divorce, the Kendra Sells Hollywood star shared if she thinks they'd ever get back together and her thoughts on dating in general.
articles.content:
It looks like Kendra Wilkinson has found the keys to her happiness.
This includes a career in real estate and co-parenting kids Hank IV, 13, and Alijah Mary, 9, with ex-husband Hank Baskett. And whi… [+860 chars]

articles.author: Sean Rueter
articles.title: Hulk Hogan pays his respects to The Iron Sheik - Cageside Seats
articles.description: Sheik never shied away from letting the world know what he thought of the Hulkster. After his death earlier this week, Hogan focuses on the positives from their professional relationship while saying his public goodbye.
articles.content:
The Iron Sheik and Hulk Hogan will always be linked in wrestling history, and in fans minds. 
Mostly thats due to their 1980s rivalry, which started with a debuting Hogan beating Sheik for the then-… [+1324 chars]
